quote: Everyone thinks of them in terms of poisoned apples and glass coffins, and forgets that they represent girls who walked into dark forests and remade them into their own reflections.
quote_letters: EVERYONE THINKS OF THEM IN TERMS OF POISONED APPLES AND GLASS COFFINS AND FORGETS THAT THEY REPRESENT GIRLS WHO WALKED INTO DARK FORESTS AND REMADE THEM INTO THEIR OWN REFLECTIONS
